channel.title: Easy way to get 2 rs accs logged in on same world at same time
channel.description:
[b]THIS DOES NOT INCLUDE THE SAME ACCOUNT, ONLY TWO DIFFERENT ONES[/b]
:eek:
its simple....below is a picture how...
step 1: line up 2 screen with users and passes (on the same world ) ps, u dont gotta use swift switch, i was just lazy and didnt open 2 windows...
this pic should be round close enough, if you can, try get them closer, by stretching/minimizing the screen
[img]http://i196.photobucket.com/albums/aa40/Ben-Scape/yus.png[/img]
anyhoo...you gotta have both accs deatails in then click the first log in then the second as fast as possible.
if it dosent work, try again, i miht make a vid of it soon...
THIS IS NOTHING SPECIAL
k thx bai ^^

item.title: Easy way to get 2 rs accs logged in on same world at same time
item.dc:creator: @rs_w00dcut rs w00dcut
item.description:
@rs_w00dcut wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:9, topic:150637”]Logging in 2 at the same time? If 2 identical IP’s appear in the game engine they disable the connection and your booted from the server. I think the Jagex employee’s know this is here but are too lazy to fix it.[/quote]Lol,No they don’t.
I’ve multi logged tons of times

Read full topic

Logging in 2 at the same time? If 2 identical IP’s appear in the game engine they disable the connection and your booted from the server. I think the Jagex employee’s know this is here but are too lazy to fix it.
